description: Observation to record details of a pot catch.

depthRange.description: The depth range of the pot in metres.

numberSize.description: The number of the target species of the required size.

catch.description: The quantity of the species and optionally of the grade caught in the trawl.

bycatch.description: The quantity of the bycatch species and optionally of the grade caught in the trawl.

wildlife.description: Details of the wildlife encountered during the trawl.

comments.description: Comments on the trawl or shot.

location.description: The location of the pot using the geojson Point feature (with its geometry).
